content.question:
This question is a short free-response question. Show your work for each part of the question.

(7 points, suggested time 13 minutes)

A model rocket of constant mass <math alttext="0.5 kilogram" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.5</mn><mo> </mo><mtext>kg</mtext></math> is launched vertically at time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>. The rocket’s engine provides a constant force of magnitude <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> for three seconds and then stops firing. The vertical velocity of the rocket as a function of time for the first <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> seconds of the flight is shown in the graph below.

(a) Calculate <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>.

frqParts.text:
This question is a short free-response question. Show your work for each part of the question.

(7 points, suggested time 13 minutes)

A model rocket of constant mass <math alttext="0.5 kilogram" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.5</mn><mo> </mo><mtext>kg</mtext></math> is launched vertically at time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>. The rocket’s engine provides a constant force of magnitude <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> for three seconds and then stops firing. The vertical velocity of the rocket as a function of time for the first <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> seconds of the flight is shown in the graph below.

(a) Calculate <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>.
(b) Calculate the time at which the rocket hits Earth after being launched.
(c) On the axes below, sketch a graph of the vertical position of the rocket as a function of time for the first <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> seconds of the flight.

skill.text: 1.B: Create quantitative graphs with appropriate scales and units, including plotting data.
